__init__(index, path, chatbot, read_func=None, max_workers=1, task_id='LLMReadTask', calls_per_minute=20)[source]

Initialize a LLMReadTask instance.

Parameters:

  • index (MemoryIndex) – List of strings representing the queries.

  • path (List[List[int]]) – List of lists, each sub-list defines a sequence over which the task is executed.

  • chatbot (Chat) – Chatbot instance used for executing queries.

  • max_workers (int) – Maximum number of worker threads (default is 4).

  • task_id (str) –

  • calls_per_minute (int) –

llm_response(message, string_out=False)[source]
Parameters:

  • chatbot (Chat) –

  • message (str) –

_execute_sub_task(sub_path)[source]

Execute a sub-task using a separate copy of the chatbot instance. each sub-stasks uses a a clean memory instance.

Parameters:

sub_path (List[int]) – List of indices representing the sub-task’s sequence.

Returns:

List of strings representing the responses for each query in the sub-task.

Return type:

List[str]
